text: Aur jab inse kaha jata hai ke aao us kanoon ki taraf jo Allah ne nazil kiya hai aur aao paigambar ki taraf, to woh jawab dete hain ke hamare liye to bas wahi tareeqa kaafi hai jispar humne apne baap dada ko paya hai. Kya yeh baap dada hi ki taqleed kiye chale jayenge khwa woh kuch na jaante hon aur saheeh raaste ki unhein khabar hi na ho
